technicalChallenges.title: Hit Registration Desync
technicalChallenges.problem: Players experienced hit registration delay due to unsynchronized RPC timing.
technicalChallenges.solution: Used server validation and corrected timing of RPC calls.
technicalChallenges.result: Consistent hit registration across clients with reduced perceived latency.

technicalChallenges.title: Match Stability
technicalChallenges.problem: Player disconnections caused match state inconsistency across clients.
technicalChallenges.solution: Handled disconnect events in GameMode with state cleanup and re-broadcast.
technicalChallenges.result: Stable match flow regardless of mid-game disconnections.

technicalChallenges.title: Premature Damage Triggering
technicalChallenges.problem: Weapon damage triggered before contact frames.
technicalChallenges.solution: Activated damage window using animation notify frames.
technicalChallenges.result: Accurate hit feedback and improved responsiveness.

technicalChallenges.title: AI Attack Range Issue
technicalChallenges.problem: Enemies attacked outside intended engagement range.
technicalChallenges.solution: Balanced detection radius and attack distance thresholds.

technicalChallenges.solution: Moved timer logic to a centralized game controller.

technicalChallenges.title: 2D Character Animation
technicalChallenges.problem: Sprite animations were stuttery and frame-timing was inconsistent.
technicalChallenges.solution: Utilized Raylib's built-in animation capabilities with frame-based delta timing.
technicalChallenges.result: Smooth, consistent character animations across all games.
